26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_ALGEBRA_CONJGRAD_H__INCLUDED
27 #define TILEDARRAY_ALGEBRA_CONJGRAD_H__INCLUDED
28 
29 #include <TiledArray/algebra/diis.h>
30 #include <TiledArray/algebra/utils.h>
31 #include <sstream>
32 #include "../dist_array.h"
33 
34 namespace TiledArray {
35 
39 
55 template <typename D, typename F>
56 struct ConjugateGradientSolver {
57  typedef typename D::element_type value_type;
58 
66  value_type operator()(F& a, const D& b, D& x, const D& preconditioner,
67  value_type convergence_target = -1.0) {
68  std::size_t n = size(preconditioner);
69 
70  const bool use_diis = false;
71  DIIS<D> diis;
72 
73  // solution vector
74  D XX_i;
75  // residual vector
76  D RR_i = clone(b);
77  // preconditioned residual vector
78  D ZZ_i;
79  // direction vector
80  D PP_i;
81  D APP_i = clone(b);
82 
83  // approximate the condition number as the ratio of the min and max elements
84  // of the preconditioner assuming that preconditioner is the approximate
85  // inverse of A in Ax - b =0
86  const value_type precond_min = minabs_value(preconditioner);
87  const value_type precond_max = maxabs_value(preconditioner);
88  const value_type cond_number = precond_max / precond_min;
89  // std::cout << "condition number = " << precond_max << " / " << precond_min
90  // << " = " << cond_number << std::endl;
91  // if convergence target is given, estimate of how tightly the system can be
92  // converged
93  if (convergence_target < 0.0) {
94  convergence_target = 1e-15 * cond_number;
95  } else { // else warn if the given system is not sufficiently well
96  // conditioned
97  if (convergence_target < 1e-15 * cond_number)
98  std::cout << "WARNING: ConjugateGradient convergence target ("
99  << convergence_target
100  << ") may be too low for 64-bit precision" << std::endl;
101  }
102 
103  bool converged = false;
104  const unsigned int max_niter = n;
105  value_type rnorm2 = 0.0;
106  const std::size_t rhs_size = size(b);
107 
108  // starting guess: x_0 = D^-1 . b
109  XX_i = copy(b);
110  vec_multiply(XX_i, preconditioner);
111 
112  // r_0 = b - a(x)
113  a(XX_i, RR_i); // RR_i = a(XX_i)
114  scale(RR_i, -1.0);
115  axpy(RR_i, 1.0, b); // RR_i = b - a(XX_i)
116 
117  if (use_diis) diis.extrapolate(XX_i, RR_i, true);
118 
119  // z_0 = D^-1 . r_0
120  ZZ_i = copy(RR_i);
121  vec_multiply(ZZ_i, preconditioner);
122 
123  // p_0 = z_0
124  PP_i = copy(ZZ_i);
125 
126  unsigned int iter = 0;
127  while (not converged) {
128  // alpha_i = (r_i . z_i) / (p_i . A . p_i)
129  value_type rz_norm2 = dot_product(RR_i, ZZ_i);
130  a(PP_i, APP_i);
131 
132  const value_type pAp_i = dot_product(PP_i, APP_i);
133  const value_type alpha_i = rz_norm2 / pAp_i;
134 
135  // x_i += alpha_i p_i
136  axpy(XX_i, alpha_i, PP_i);
137 
138  // r_i -= alpha_i Ap_i
139  axpy(RR_i, -alpha_i, APP_i);
140 
141  if (use_diis) diis.extrapolate(XX_i, RR_i, true);
142 
143  const value_type r_ip1_norm = norm2(RR_i) / rhs_size;
144  if (r_ip1_norm < convergence_target) {
145  converged = true;
146  rnorm2 = r_ip1_norm;
147  }
148 
149  // z_i = D^-1 . r_i
150  ZZ_i = copy(RR_i);
151  vec_multiply(ZZ_i, preconditioner);
152 
153  const value_type rz_ip1_norm2 = dot_product(ZZ_i, RR_i);
154 
155  const value_type beta_i = rz_ip1_norm2 / rz_norm2;
156 
157  // p_i = z_i+1 + beta_i p_i
158  // 1) scale p_i by beta_i
159  // 2) add z_i+1 (i.e. current contents of z_i)
160  scale(PP_i, beta_i);
161  axpy(PP_i, 1.0, ZZ_i);
162 
163  ++iter;
164  // std::cout << "iter=" << iter << " dnorm=" << r_ip1_norm << std::endl;
165 
166  if (converged) {
167  assign(x, XX_i);
168  } else if (iter >= max_niter)
169  throw std::domain_error(
170  "ConjugateGradient: max # of iterations exceeded");
171  } // solver loop
172 
173  assign(x, XX_i);
174 
175  return rnorm2;
176  }
177 };
178 
179 }; // namespace TiledArray
180 
181 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ALGEBRA_CONJGRAD_H__INCLUDED
